trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule"></xref> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to delete all child objects, regardless of the permissions that the child objects have.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DeleteTreeAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance, and inherited object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
